LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_BreachAxe.label: breach axe
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_BreachAxe.description: A combined blade and tool-head attached to a sturdy haft. While slightly less effective than other weapons against human enemies, it excels at tearing down walls, doors, and other structures thanks to its integrated tool-head.
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_BreachAxe.tools.handle.label: handle
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_BreachAxe.tools.head.label: head
